channel.title: Has somone got a, MemberShip Tut please
channel.description:
Hey, mopars!
Does anyone of you have a, MemberShip Tut. I need to add to my server! Please help <3

item.title: Has somone got a, MemberShip Tut please
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Well, in player.java, search “member” and make sure the number beside that is 0.

And if you want to make weapons need membership, you pretty much just make a new requirement, if you know how to make requirements, you’ll know what i mean, and if you want to make an action, such as vengeance need membership, you just add

if (playerIsMember == 1)

Before your character does the action, or whatever.

Read full topic
item.source: Has somone got a, MemberShip Tut please
